template.source:
export default function({ data = [], t }) { return (
{data.map((obj) => (

{t("/supply/production/productionOrder")} {obj.id}

{t("/catalog/company/company")}
{obj.company.person.name}
{t("/catalog/person/personDocumentType/enum/BR_CNPJ")}
{obj.company.person.documentNumber}
{t("/@word/date")}
{obj.date}
{t("/@word/status")}
{obj.status}
{t("/@word/tags")}
{obj.tags}
{t("/@word/comments")}
{obj.properties.comments}
{obj.steps.map((step) => (
{t("/supply/production/productionStep")} {step.id}
{t("/supply/production/productionStepProduction")}
{step.productions.map((production) => ( ))}
{t("/@word/code")} {t("/@word/description")} {t("/@word/complement")} {t("/@word/variant")} {t("/@word/quantity")} {t("/@word/quantity/produced")}
{production.productPacking.code} {production.productPacking.product.description} {production.productPacking.complement} {production.productPacking.variant?.code}, {production.productPacking.variant?.description} {production.quantity} {production.productPacking.product.unit.code}
 
{t("/supply/production/productionStepConsumption")}
{step.consumptions.map((consumption) => ( ))}
{t("/@word/code")} {t("/@word/description")} {t("/@word/complement")} {t("/@word/variant")} {t("/@word/quantity")} {t("/@word/quantity/consumed")}
{consumption.productPacking.code} {consumption.productPacking.product.description} {consumption.productPacking.complement} {consumption.productPacking.variant?.code}, {consumption.productPacking.variant?.description} {consumption.quantity} {consumption.productPacking.product.unit.code}
 
))}
))}
); }
